page.title: 15LIFESTYLES POTTERS HOLIDAY.
page.content: Every year a worker in the Potteries has these holidays,one week at Easter,the first Monday in May,which is called May Day.The PotterÂ£s Fortnight,the last week in Juneand the first week in July.One week in August,which is the last week,and two weeks at Christmas.. The PotterÂ£s fortnight is where all the potteries have two weeks off,and the schools and most of the factories have have those two weeks off too.When they finish work all the pottery factories close down for their holiday.Then most people go away,for example Blackpool and Rhyl are are the most popular places to visit in Britain. When everyone goes away for their holidays our area is empty and quiet.
